metadata.title: Improving communication in a virtual newsroom - Newsrewired special
metadata.description: Working from home has left many journalists feeling burnt out, isolated, and unable to contribute to meetings on Zoom. Learn how to change online conversations so everyone feels heard and valued
metadata.author: Jacob Granger

This is an important story to me personally. The hotel that burned down was the place I was staying with my now-wife the weekend I proposed to her. But it‚Äôs also good to see organisations reflecting on coverage after the event.

metadata.description: The memory of Exeter‚Äôs illustrious Royal Clarence and the day it burned to the ground is forever etched in the minds of the city
metadata.author: Behind Local News
